Current Las Vegas Market Insights

Stay informed about current market conditions

Current Market Trend

Seller's Market

Limited inventory with strong buyer demand

Be prepared to act quickly on desirable properties

Average Days on Market

22 Days

Homes are selling faster than average

Have financing ready and be prepared to make quick decisions

Price Appreciation

+12.4%

Year-over-year price growth

Consider long-term investment potential

Inventory Levels

2.1 Months

Below normal inventory levels

Limited selection may require flexibility on criteria

Your 6-Step Home Buying Journey

A proven process for successful home buying

1
📋

Get Pre-Approved

Understand your budget and financing options before starting your search

Key Tips:

  • •Check your credit score
  • •Gather financial documents
  • •Compare lender rates
1-2 weeks
2
🎯

Define Your Needs

Create a clear list of must-haves, nice-to-haves, and deal-breakers

Key Tips:

  • •Location preferences
  • •Size requirements
  • •Budget constraints
  • •Timeline
1 week
3
🔍

Start Your Search

Work with your agent to find properties that match your criteria

Key Tips:

  • •Set up MLS alerts
  • •Attend open houses
  • •Schedule private showings
2-8 weeks
4
✍️

Make an Offer

Submit a competitive offer with guidance from your agent

Key Tips:

  • •Market analysis
  • •Negotiation strategy
  • •Contingencies
1-3 days
5
🔍

Due Diligence

Complete inspections, appraisals, and finalize financing

Key Tips:

  • •Home inspection
  • •Appraisal
  • •Title search
  • •Final loan approval
2-3 weeks
6
🔑

Closing

Sign final paperwork and receive your keys

Key Tips:

  • •Final walkthrough
  • •Closing costs
  • •Insurance setup
  • •Utility transfers
1 day

Financing Options

Understanding your mortgage options

Conventional Loans

Down Payment:5-20%
Credit Score:620+

Pros:

Lower rates, no PMI with 20% down

Cons:

Higher credit requirements

FHA Loans

Down Payment:3.5%
Credit Score:580+

Pros:

Lower credit requirements, smaller down payment

Cons:

Higher rates, mortgage insurance required

VA Loans

Down Payment:0%
Credit Score:580+

Pros:

No down payment, lower rates, no PMI

Cons:

Veterans only, funding fee required

USDA Loans

Down Payment:0%
Credit Score:640+

Pros:

No down payment, lower rates

Cons:

Rural areas only, income limits

Common Home Buying Mistakes

Learn from others\' experiences to avoid costly errors

Skipping Pre-Approval

Consequence:

Wasting time on homes you can't afford

Solution:

Get pre-approved before starting your search

Not Researching Neighborhoods

Consequence:

Buying in an area that doesn't fit your lifestyle

Solution:

Visit neighborhoods at different times of day

Waiving Inspections

Consequence:

Missing costly hidden problems

Solution:

Always get a professional home inspection

Emotional Decision Making

Consequence:

Overpaying or buying the wrong home

Solution:

Stick to your criteria and budget

Ignoring Hidden Costs

Consequence:

Financial strain after purchase

Solution:

Budget for closing costs, taxes, and maintenance
